severities.severity: An error occured in the application, processing cannot continue.
An unrecoverable error in the document. Output cannot be processed.
A recoverable error was discovered in the document. Processing can continue.
An unknown or unanticipated error occured in the application. Processing cannot continue.

errorCodes.message: Unicode byte-order-markers are not allowed in input.
End-of-file characters are not allowed in input.
Cannot expand a simple character into unicode or tags.
Null characters are not allowed in input.
Tags are not allowed after the end WORK tag.
Text is not allowed after the end WORK tag.
The document ended before the iseHeader start tag.
The first tag after the WORK tag must be the start iseHeader tag.
Text is not allowed before the start iseHeader tag.
The document ended before the WORK start tag.
The first tag in a document must be the start WORK tag.
Text is not allowed before the start WORK tag.
The documented ended before the end WORK tag.
The iseHeader tag should not occur in the body of the document.
The META and LINK tags should only occur inside iseHeader tags.
The WORK tag should only occur at the start and end of a document.
The document ended inside the iseHeader tag.
Only LINK and META tags are allowed in the iseHeader tag.
Text is not allowed inside the iseHeader tag.
Old-style Abbreviations cannot contain special character markup.
End of file inside abbreviation markup.
Old-style Abbreviation missing closing pipe character (|).
End of file inside attribute value.
Expected space after attribute value.
Shorthand attribute markup (<TLN=3> instead of <TLN n="3">) is depreciated.
Smart quotes are not allowed around attribute values.
Attribute names must start with a letter.
Attribute names must only contain letters and digits.
Attribute values should be quoted.
Unquoted attribute values are ambiguous.
Attribute value is missing.
Special characters do not nest more than two levels deep.
End of file inside special character markup.
Special character markup missing the closing brace (}).
Comments should not contain "--" except at the start and end.
End of file inside comment.
Comments should start '<!--'.
Comments should not contain '--'.
Unexpected end of file inside markup.
Unexpected greater-than (>) inside markup.
Syntax error in tag.
End of file inside tag name.
Cannot find tag name.
Tag names must start with a letter.
Tag names must only contain letters and digits.
An unknown or unexpected error occured.
Pipe-style abbreviations are depreciated. Use <ABBR>...</ABBR> instead.
Annotation notes must be level 0, 1, 2, or 3.
This TLN is not parseable.
This lemma should be split.
The lemma cannot be matched to the document.
The lemma's TLN cannot be found in the document.
The attribute value is not in the list of allowed values.
The attribute should be a number.
The attribute value is not in the list of allowed values.
The attribute is missing.
The attribute is depreciated.
A required attribute is missing.
The attribute's value is a placeholder.
The attribute is not defined in the schema.
The lemma's @resp attribute does not look correct.
The ln element does not look like a line number.
The rdg @resp attribute does not look correct.
End tag without a start tag.
ISE tags cannot be nested recursively.
This tag is split/improperly nested.
This tag is not closed.
This tag is depreciated.
End tags do not take attributes.
Empty tag should be empty.
Empty tag should be start/end tags.
Start tag should be empty tag.
This tag is not defined in the schema.
{#} is depreciated SGML markup.
